SELECT
, sum(a.freight) AS logisticsFreight , sum(a.operation) as logisticsOperation , sum(a.value_price) as logisticsValuePrice
FROM biz_invoice a
LEFT JOIN biz_detail_invoice bi ON bi.invoice_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN biz_order_header bo ON bo.id = bi.order_header_id
LEFT JOIN biz_request_header br ON br.id = bi.request_header_id
LEFT JOIN biz_detail_invoice bi ON bi.invoice_id = a.id LEFT JOIN biz_order_header bo ON bo.id = bi.order_header_id
a.status = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.send_number LIKE '%'||#{sendNumber}||'%' '%'+#{sendNumber}+'%' concat('%',#{sendNumber},'%')
AND a.tracking_number LIKE '%'||#{trackingNumber}||'%' '%'+#{trackingNumber}+'%' concat('%',#{trackingNumber},'%')
AND bo.order_num LIKE '%'||#{orderNum}||'%' '%'+#{orderNum}+'%' concat('%',#{orderNum},'%')
AND br.req_no LIKE '%'||#{reqNo}||'%' '%'+#{reqNo}+'%' concat('%',#{reqNo},'%')
AND a.logistics_id = #{logistics.id}
AND a.biz_status = #{bizStatus}
AND a.ship = #{ship}
AND bl.name LIKE '%'||#{logistics.name}||'%' '%'+#{logistics.name}+'%' concat('%',#{logistics.name},'%')
AND a.carrier LIKE '%'||#{carrier}||'%' '%'+#{carrier}+'%' concat('%',#{carrier},'%')
AND a.settlement_status = #{settlementStatus}
${sqlMap.bizInvoice}
AND (a.tracking_number !=null OR a.tracking_number != '')
GROUP BY a.id
GROUP BY a.tracking_number
GROUP BY a.id
ORDER BY a.send_time DESC
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

mapper.select: SELECT oh.order_num AS "orderHeader.orderNum", od.sku_name AS "skuName", od.part_no AS "partNo", od.buy_price AS "buyPrice", od.unit_price AS "unitPrice", od.ord_qty AS "ordQty", od.sent_qty AS "sentQty", od.create_time AS "createDate", soo.name AS "suplyis.name", si.item_no AS "skuInfo.itemNo", so.name AS "so.name", oh.id AS "orderHeader.id", oh.biz_status AS "orderHeader.bizStatus", bi.id AS "orderHeader.sendId", bi.send_number AS "orderHeader.sendNum" FROM biz_order_header oh LEFT JOIN biz_order_detail od ON oh.id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN sys_office soo ON soo.id = od.suply_id LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info si ON si.id = od.sku_id LEFT JOIN biz_product_info bpi ON bpi.id = si.prod_id LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON so.id = bpi.vendor_id LEFT JOIN biz_detail_invoice di ON di.order_header_id = oh.id LEFT JOIN biz_invoice bi ON bi.id = di.invoice_id WHERE (bi.status = 1 AND bi.biz_status = 1 AND bi.ship = 0 AND od.status != 0 AND bi.tracking_number = #{trackingNumber}) or (oh.status = 1 AND oh.order_type = 6 AND bi.tracking_number = #{trackingNumber}) GROUP BY oh.order_num ,bi.send_number ORDER BY oh.order_num
